key.name: audio-dir
key.description: Directory for saving reminder audio files

key.name: ba-reminder-interval
key.description: Number of units for determining a birthday or anniversary reminder

key.name: ba-reminder-units
key.description: Units for a birthday or anniversary reminder, “minutes”, “hours” or “days”

key.name: compress-weekend
key.description: Whether to compress weekends in the month view, which puts Saturday and Sunday in the space of one weekday

key.name: confirm-delete
key.summary: Ask for confirmation when deleting items
key.description: Whether to ask for confirmation when deleting an appointment or task

key.name: confirm-purge
key.description: Whether to ask for confirmation when expunging appointments and tasks

key.name: date-navigator-pane-position
key.description: Position of the vertical pane, between the calendar lists and the date navigator calendar

key.name: date-navigator-pane-position-sub
key.description: Position of the vertical pane, between the calendar lists and the date navigator calendar

key.name: day-end-hour
key.description: Hour the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format, 0 to 23

key.name: day-end-minute
key.description: Minute the workday ends on, 0 to 59.

key.name: day-start-hour
key.description: Hour the workday starts on, in twenty four hour format, 0 to 23.

key.name: day-start-minute
key.description: Minute the workday starts on, 0 to 59.

key.name: day-start-mon
key.description: Time the workday starts on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-mon
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-tue
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-tue
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-wed
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-wed
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-thu
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-thu
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-fri
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-fri
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-sat
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-sat
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-start-sun
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-start-hour and day-start-minute

key.name: day-end-sun
key.description: Time the workday ends on, in twenty four hour format HHMM, 0000 to 2359, or -1 to use day-end-hour and day-end-minute

key.name: day-second-zone
key.summary: The second timezone for a Day View
key.description: Shows the second time zone in a Day View, if set. Value is similar to one used in a “timezone” key

key.name: day-second-zones
key.summary: Recently used second time zones in a Day View
key.description: List of recently used second time zones in a Day View

key.name: day-second-zones-max
key.summary: Maximum number of recently used timezones to remember
key.description: Maximum number of recently used timezones to remember in a “day-second-zones” list

key.name: default-reminder-interval
key.description: Number of units for determining a default reminder

key.name: default-reminder-units
key.description: Units for a default reminder, “minutes”, “hours” or “days”

key.name: editor-show-categories
key.summary: Show categories field in the event/meeting/task editor
key.description: Whether to show categories field in the event/meeting editor

key.name: editor-show-role
key.summary: Show Role field in the event/task/meeting editor
key.description: Whether to show role field in the event/task/meeting editor

key.name: editor-show-rsvp
key.summary: Show RSVP field in the event/task/meeting editor
key.description: Whether to show RSVP field in the event/task/meeting editor

key.name: editor-show-status
key.summary: Show status field in the event/task/meeting editor
key.description: Whether to show status field in the event/task/meeting editor

key.name: editor-show-timezone
key.summary: Show timezone field in the event/meeting editor
key.description: Whether to show timezone field in the event/meeting editor

key.name: editor-show-type
key.summary: Show type field in the event/task/meeting editor
key.description: Whether to show type field in the event/task/meeting editor

key.name: hide-completed-tasks
key.description: Whether to hide completed tasks in the tasks view

key.name: hide-completed-tasks-units
key.description: Units for determining when to hide tasks, “minutes”, “hours” or “days”

key.name: hide-completed-tasks-value
key.description: Number of units for determining when to hide tasks

key.name: hide-cancelled-events
key.description: Whether to hide cancelled events in the calendar view

key.name: hide-cancelled-tasks
key.description: Whether to hide cancelled tasks in the tasks view

key.name: hpane-position
key.description: Position of the horizontal pane, between the date navigator calendar and the task list when not in the month view, in pixels

key.name: last-notification-time
key.description: Time the last reminder ran, in time_t

key.name: marcus-bains-color-dayview
key.summary: Marcus Bains Line Color — Day View
key.description: Color to draw the Marcus Bains line in the Day View

key.name: marcus-bains-color-timebar
key.summary: Marcus Bains Line Color — Time bar
key.description: Color to draw the Marcus Bains Line in the Time bar (empty for default)

key.name: marcus-bains-line
key.description: Whether to draw the Marcus Bains Line (line at current time) in the calendar

key.name: memo-hpane-position
key.description: Position of the task preview pane when oriented horizontally

key.name: memo-layout
key.description: The layout style determines where to place the preview pane in relation to the memo list. “0” (Classic View) places the preview pane below the memo list. “1” (Vertical View) places the preview pane next to the memo list

key.name: memo-vpane-position
key.description: Position of the memo preview pane when oriented vertically

key.name: month-hpane-position
key.description: Position of the horizontal pane, between the view and the date navigator calendar and task list in the month view, in pixels

key.name: month-scroll-by-week
key.summary: Scroll Month View by a week, not by a month
key.description: Whether to scroll a Month View by a week, not by a month

key.name: month-start-with-current-week
key.summary: Let the Month View start with the current week
key.description: Whether the month view should show weeks starting with the current week instead of the first week of the month.

key.name: prefer-new-item
key.description: Name of the preferred New toolbar button item

key.name: primary-calendar
key.description: The UID of the selected (or “primary”) calendar in the sidebar of the “Calendar” view

key.name: primary-memos
key.description: The UID of the selected (or “primary”) memo list in the sidebar of the “Memos” view

key.name: primary-tasks
key.description: The UID of the selected (or “primary”) task list in the sidebar of the “Tasks” view

key.name: publish-template
key.description: The URL template to use as a free/busy data fallback, %u is replaced by the user part of the mail address and %d is replaced by the domain

key.name: recur-events-italic
key.description: Show days with recurrent events in italic font in bottom left calendar

key.name: search-range-years
key.summary: Search range for time-based searching in years
key.description: How many years can the time-based search go forward or backward from currently selected day when searching for another occurrence; default is ten years

key.name: show-event-end
key.summary: Show appointment end times in week and month views
key.description: Whether to display the end time of events in the week and month views

key.name: show-icons-month-view
key.summary: Show appointment icons in the month view
key.description: Whether to show icons of events in the month view

key.name: show-memo-preview
key.description: If “true”, show the memo preview pane in the main window

key.name: show-task-preview
key.description: If “true”, show the task preview pane in the main window

key.name: show-week-numbers
key.summary: Show week numbers in Day View, Work Week View, and Date Navigator
key.description: Whether to show week numbers in various places in the Calendar

key.name: tag-vpane-position
key.summary: Vertical position for the tag pane
key.description: Vertical position for the tag pane

key.name: show-tag-vpane
key.summary: Show Tasks and Memos pane in the Calendar view
key.description: Whether to show Tasks and Memos pane in the Calendar view

key.name: task-due-today-highlight
key.description: Whether highlight tasks due today with a special color (task-due-today-color)

key.name: task-due-today-color
key.description: Background color of tasks that are due today, in “#rrggbb” format. Used together with task-due-today-highlight

key.name: task-hpane-position
key.description: Position of the task preview pane when oriented horizontally

key.name: task-layout
key.description: The layout style determines where to place the preview pane in relation to the task list. “0” (Classic View) places the preview pane below the task list. “1” (Vertical View) places the preview pane next to the task list

key.name: task-vpane-position
key.description: Position of the task preview pane when oriented vertically

key.name: task-overdue-highlight
key.description: Whether highlight overdue tasks with a special color (task-overdue-color)

key.name: task-overdue-color
key.description: Background color of tasks that are overdue, in “#rrggbb” format. Used together with task-overdue-highlight.

key.name: time-divisions
key.description: Intervals shown in Day and Work Week views, in minutes

key.name: timezone
key.description: The default timezone to use for dates and times in the calendar, as an untranslated Olson timezone database location like “America/New York”

key.name: use-24hour-format
key.description: Whether to show times in twenty four hour format instead of using am/pm

key.name: use-ba-reminder
key.description: Whether to set a reminder for birthdays and anniversaries

key.name: use-default-reminder
key.description: Whether to set a default reminder for appointments

key.name: use-system-timezone
key.description: Use the system timezone instead of the timezone selected in Evolution

key.name: classify-private
key.summary: Create events, memos and tasks as Private by default

key.name: draw-flat-events
key.summary: Draw events as flat, not shaded.

key.name: week-view-days-left-to-right
key.summary: Whether to order days in the Week View from left to right, rather than from top to bottom.

key.name: allow-direct-summary-edit
key.summary: Allow direct edit of event Summary when clicking on it in the Day, Work Week, Week or Month view.

key.name: use-markdown-editor
key.summary: Whether to use markdown editor for the description in the component editor.

key.name: week-start-day
key.summary: (Deprecated) First day of the week, from Sunday (0) to Saturday (6)
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use “week-start-day-name” instead.

key.name: working-days
key.description: Days on which the start and end of work hours should be indicated. (This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use the “work-day-monday”, “work-day-tuesday”, etc. keys instead.)
